headline: Assessing Whether Keurig Dr Pepper (KDP) Is Undervalued After Recent Share Price Momentum
summary: Why Keurig Dr Pepper Is Back on Investors’ Radar Keurig Dr Pepper (KDP) is drawing fresh attention after recent share performance, with the stock showing mixed returns across different periods while the business reports annual revenue of US$16.2b and net income of US$1.6b. See our latest analysis for Keurig Dr Pepper. At a share price of US$29.14, Keurig Dr Pepper’s recent 30 day share price return of 6.31% and 90 day share price return of 7.09% contrast with a 1 year total shareholder return...
